pageContext.claim: “This is the single greatest witch hunt of a politician in American history!”
pageContext.analysis: The appointment of a special counsel is just the beginning of a process. The Government Accountability Office concluded that the equivalent of $132 million was spent on independent probes during Bill Clinton's presidency, culminating in the impeachment trial in the Senate that left him in office. At this point, it's a bit premature for Trump to make this claim.
